articles.author: Simon Burnton
articles.title: Virat Kohli gives India a glimmer of hope after Australia set daunting target - The Guardian
articles.description: Virat Kohli and Ajinkya Rahane steadied the ship for India after they were set a daunting target of 444 by Australia
articles.content: Where there is Virat Kohli there is hope. There are not many causes for Indian optimism as they chase a target of 444 but one of them ended the day unbeaten on 44, and for as long as he remains so wi… [+10774 chars]

articles.title: World Test Championship final: Australia v India, day four – live - The Guardian
articles.description: Over-by-over report: Join our writers for updates from the fourth day of play at the Oval
articles.content: <strong>77th over: Australia 223-6 (Carey 50, Starc 24)</strong> Just missed it in the first innings, but Carey raises 50 here with a drive from Jadeja. Hes done it at a good clip and at … [+43326 chars]
